Reviews.Title: Bundle description
Reviews.Author: Beverly "Photo Bug"
Reviews.Content: The description of this bundle clearly states  "Note:" Lens not included.For me, however, this was just what I wanted.  I have a Canon 5D Mark II with many L lenses.  Due to having brokenthree vertebrae in two years, I needed a much lighter camera.  All my wonderful professional lenses will fit on this cameraand in some instances even provide an interesting result due to the 1:6 magnification factor of this Rebel T3i.  I am aCanon fan all the way!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: Wish we would have read and realized this did not come with a lens!! It was a birthday gift and after opened we laughed!
